definition: to take/to borrow/to pick (flowers, fruit etc)/to pluck/to select/to remove/to take off (glasses, hat etc)

sentences.english: Be as follows all sorts of viewpoint cento now.
sentences.chinese: 现将各种观点摘录如下。

sentences.english: He read several extracts from the poem.
sentences.chinese: 他从那本书中摘录了几个句子。

sentences.english: Excerpts from three Qing crime cases support these conclusions.
sentences.chinese: 我将摘录三种清代刑科题本来支持上述论点。

sentences.english: And they may excerpt others’ work for the purpose of commentary and criticism.
sentences.chinese: 他们可能出于评论和批评需要而摘录别人的著述。

sentences.english: Auto- abstracting could also be used to alleviate the translation burden.
sentences.chinese: 摘录汽车的也可能用来减轻翻译负担。

sentences.english: It will be my pleasure to share with you some of this double-talk so typical of our times.
sentences.chinese: 我很乐意摘录几则典型的故弄玄虚的评论，与君共享。

sentences.english: Excerpts of these recommendations are shown below.
sentences.chinese: 下面显示了这些建议的摘录。

sentences.english: Talk about it in your own words with examples from the excerpt?
sentences.chinese: 谈你自己的话，有有关的摘录的例子吗？

sentences.english: Both authors independently extracted data and assessed trial quality.
sentences.chinese: 由两名作者分别独立摘录资料且评估试验之品质。

sentences.english: This excerpt deals with how companies can set strategy when the future is unknowable.
sentences.chinese: 这个摘录涉及在未来未知时公司如何来制定战略。

sentences.english: After the quote was removed from the screen, Russert turned to me.
sentences.chinese: 在摘录被从荧屏上移走后，拉塞特转向我。

sentences.english: The solicitor sent an extract of the deeds.
sentences.chinese: 初级律师寄出一份契据的摘录本。

sentences.english: This passage is taken from Wuthering Heights.
sentences.chinese: 这一段摘录自《呼啸山庄》。

sentences.english: Adopt from Evaluation Questionnaire of Project Astro Mind.
sentences.chinese: 摘录自《飞跃成长路训练计划》评估问卷。

sentences.english: This sentence fell from that textbook.
sentences.chinese: 这话是从那本教科书中摘录下来的。

definition: excerpt/selection (from a book)/to select/to choose an extract
to quote/to cite/to recommend/to appoint/(computing) reference
to annotate/to add marginal comments on/criticism/marginalia
marginal notes/annotation/to annotate/to add comments to text
